name: Want To Hear a Scary Story?
name_original: Want To Hear a Scary Story?
description:
Controls:
WASD - Movement
Click - To interact 
Space - To wait
R to restart

You were once tormented, and killed in a fateful incident. You're body was never to be found again. But now, it is time to awaken and take your revenge.

Take up the mantle of a Slasher villain, hack and chop your way through victims to get revenge.

This is a project I started working on out of a love of Slasher movies. The idea has been put on hold for now as I am unsure as whether it has legs to stand on in its current form. So I have uploaded the game as it is so far, it has a lot of the basic elements in, so feel free to play around with it and let me know what you think.

Some of the core goals for the game were:

  • A procedurally generated mythos of your character.
  • An act system where you will create more sequels that get stranger and stranger the longer you survive before getting destroyed for good.
  • The ability to use the fear you create when you terrorize your victims to power up your character and your weapons to inspire the mythos around you.
